name: Souls of Ezoria
description:
Kushal Sithlu

Nikiel Gopichand

Saadiya Khan

The land of Elzoria was once a magical place, now, defiled by the evil overlord, Elzoria is left a wasteland for the soulless minions of an evil overlord. Travel through Icey Tundras, Molten Mountains, and more, as you fight your way through The Overlord’s army of husks. Harness the power of mystical weapons and magic as you forge your soul into the ultimate weapon. The Souls of Elzoria rest on your shoulders. A 3D third-person action-adventure, role-playing game, where the player can play as a movable character that can traverse through the world, experience the storyline, fight enemies and unlock their character’s fullest potential.
